item.title: Building an R training environment
item.description: I recently delivered a day of training at SQLBits and I really upped my game in terms of infrastructure for it. The resultant solution was super smooth and mitigated all the install issues and preparation for attendees. This meant we got to spend the whole day doing R, instead of troubleshooting. I’m so happy with the solution for an online R training environment that I want to share the solution, so you can take it and use it for when you need to do training.
